com.erdao.maps.markerclusterer
クラス GeoClusterer.GeoCluster

java.lang.Object
  com.erdao.maps.markerclusterer.GeoClusterer.GeoCluster
含まれているクラス:
GeoClusterer
public class GeoClusterer.GeoCluster
extends Object

GeoCluster class. contains single marker object(ClusterMarker). mostly wraps methods in ClusterMarker.

フィールドの概要
protected  GeoPoint center_
          center of cluster
private  GeoClusterer clusterer_
          GeoClusterer object
protected  ClusterMarker clusterMarker_
          ClusterMarker object
private  List<GeoItem> items_
          list of GeoItem within cluster
private  int zoom_
          zoomlevel at the point Cluster was made

onNotifyDrawFromMarker

public void onNotifyDrawFromMarker()
Hooking Overlay.draw event to detect if it is moving/zooming. calls GeoCluster.onNotifyDraw.

onTapCalledFromMarker

public void onTapCalledFromMarker(boolean flg)
Hooking Tap event from ClusterMarker layer.

パラメータ:
flg - true if the tap event was captured, else false.

clear

clears cluster object.

redraw

public void redraw()
redraw cluster. if needed create ClusterMarker object.

isInBounds

protected boolean isInBounds(GeoBounds bounds)
check if the GeoBounds are within cluster.

戻り値:
true if bounds are within this cluster size.
